divs: sighting details i live about 10 miles from fort drum military base close to edwards,ny.i walked outside on my front porch at 10:30 pm on 6\4\12 and within about 30 seconds i noticed a light appear low in the sky.it was in the opposite direction of the military base.it started moving horizontally across the sky meandering up and down,then after about a minute it disappeared and reappeared at a much higher altitude (straight up)within a second or two.it repeated this process 4-5 times getting higher and higher until it disappeared all together.it was completely quiet,within a few minutes after a jet flew from the base through the area.i have seen many jets,planes,helicopters,and drones and i instantly knew this was different.i pulled out my phone and took a picture (10:31 pm)and in the picture it appears to be 4 sided with a dark center.i did some research and i couldn't find anything i can explain that looks like this.
Summary: strange apparently 4 sided light with a dark center
trends: There has been one other sighting in Gouverneur
There was one other sighting in Gouverneur on or around June 4th 2012
